name: Flairtron
description: This app helps you update, manage, and preserve aspects of user's flairs

SUBREDDIT.description: Subreddit name. (Note: Don't include the '/r/') EX:'worldnews' 'Unexpected' or 'DIY'

USERNAME.description: Your bot's username. (Note: Don't include the '/u/') EX:'myflairbot' 'gariond' or 'mysuperawesomebot'

MESSAGE_SUBJECT.description: The subject line needed for the bot to respond (Defaults to 'Flair')

LOGGING.description: Determines if your bot will write to its log. (If you don't know what this is, leave it as 'False'.

REFRESH_INTERVAL.description: How often (in seconds) you want your bot to check and update flairs. (Note: Lower settings may result in reddit restricting your bot's access.)

APP_ID.description: The reddit API App ID. (Not sure what this is? Review readme.md at https://github.com/B3rry/survivor-flair-bot for instructions on how to obtain your APP_ID)

APP_SECRET.description: The reddit API App Secret. (Not sure what this is? Review readme.md at https://github.com/B3rry/survivor-flair-bot for instructions on how to obtain your APP_ID)
